mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectPrmFeeEventCom Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FEE_EVENT_SN , COM_ID , AFF_VRSC_COM_ID , USE_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM PRM_FEE_EVENT_COM WHERE 1 = 1 AND FEE_EVENT_SN = #{feeEventSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND COM_ID = #{comId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AFF_VRSC_COM_ID = #{affVrscComId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
